default.title: Trusted by creative teams everywhere
default.description: Studios, agencies, and indie makers rely on Banana Generator to speed up AI photo editing without losing brand quality.

items.quote: Banana Generator cut our product shot editing time in half while keeping every color on-brand.
items.author: Maya Thompson

items.quote: The AI photo editor helps our designers iterate fast and stay consistent across every campaign.
items.author: Leo Martins

items.quote: As a solo creator, I love how the AI handles lighting adjustments so I can focus on storytelling.
items.author: Jules Rivera

default.callout: Looking for compliance docs? Visit our <privacyLink>privacy center</privacyLink> for AI data practices.
